DebugMode.label: Enable Debug Mode
DebugMode.tooltip: If enabled, will log higher level of events.

Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command to trigger the track title in chat

LastFMUser.label: LastFM UserName
LastFMUser.tooltip: Your lastfm username to look up what is currently being scobbled.

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PlayingMessage.label: Playing Response Message
PlayingMessage.tooltip:
Response when a track is playing.
$GPMARTIST = The Artist
$GPMTITLE = Track Titles
$GPMALBUM = The Album
